semantics.tolerancepair

Class BruteForceTolerancePairCreator

  • Object
    • TolerancePairCreator
      • BruteForceTolerancePairCreator

  • public class BruteForceTolerancePairCreator
extends TolerancePairCreator
    Brute-force approach to create tolerance-pairs. All possible partition-pairs for a knowledge base and a domain are generated and tested.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class TolerancePairCreator

        domain, explanations, kb, pairs, worlds

      • createPairs

        public void createPairs(ProgressListener listener)
        Starts the creation progress. A reference to an object implementing the listener interface can be passed, which will then receive updates regarding the progress.
        Specified by:
